resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Provisioning Type
resourceTypeAttributes.description: You choose the storage type of a hard disk when you add the hard disk to the virtual machine. Indicate if a virtual disk is provisioned thin or thick.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Migrate Encryption
resourceTypeAttributes.description: The set of valid encrypted vMotion modes for a VM. This defaults to opportunistic for a regular VM, and will be set to required for an encrypted VM

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|SCSI Bus Sharing
resourceTypeAttributes.description: You can set the type of SCSI bus sharing for a virtual machine and indicate whether to share the SCSI bus. Depending on the type of sharing, virtual machines can access the same virtual disk simultaneously on the same server or on any server.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Disk Mode
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Disk mode determines how a virtual disk is affected by snapshots. This disk modes act on each individual VMDK, not on a whole VM

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Datastore Cluster(s)
resourceTypeAttributes.description: The datastore cluster(s) the VM reside on.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: VMware Aria Operations Generated Properties|Current Collector ID
VMware Aria Operations Generated Properties|Object Type Classification
Disk Space|Snapshot|Number of Days Old
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Number of days since snapshot creation

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|IOPS Limit
resourceTypeAttributes.description: The upper Limit of Disk IO per second that the virtual disk is entitled for.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Number of Virtual Disks
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Number of Virtual Disks including RDMs

resourceTypeAttributes.name: VMware Aria Operations Generated Properties|Business Hours
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Business Hours defined in effective policy.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Application components the Virtual Machine depends on
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Application components running on other machines that this Virtual Machine depends on.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Hardware|Number of CPU cores per socket
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Number of CPU cores per virtual socket

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Network|Direct Path I/O Status
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Status of VM Direct Path I/O, a setting that enable access to physical PCI functions on platforms.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: VCM|Template|Last data collection
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Last time data was collected for templates

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Memory|Guest OS Memory not collecting
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Track if the memory counters from the Guest OS are received by VMware Aria Operations. If not, troubleshoot the root cause as this impacts right-sizing.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|SMBIOS UUID
resourceTypeAttributes.description: System Management BIOS UUID of a virtual machine

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Guest Operating System|Hostname
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Hostname of the guest operating system, if known

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|MOID
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Managed object ID in vCenter. This is unique in scope of vCenter.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Is Instant Clone
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Property indicating whether the object is Instant Clone.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: System|Notes
resourceTypeAttributes.description: The description of the VM as shown in the vCenter client UI.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: VMware Aria Operations Generated Properties|Object Type Subclassification
Summary|Datastore with only swap file
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Datastore containing only the swap file and no other files from this VM

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|FT Peer VM
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Peer of the VM in Fault Tolerance Group

resourceTypeAttributes.name: vSAN|VM Storage Policies|Compliance
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Compliance status of the VM storage object

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|FT Role
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Role of the VM in Fault Tolerance Group

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Horizon VM Type
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Property indicating type of the Horizon internal VM. It can be either of the following: "Parent", "Replica"

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Guest Operating System|Guest OS from Tools
resourceTypeAttributes.description: This is the value provided by VMware Tools. This value will differ to the value set in vCenter if the Guest OS was upgraded, or a different Guest OS was installed

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Datastore|Highest Observed Number of Write Requests
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Highest Observed Number of Write Requests

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Runtime|Idleness indicator
resourceTypeAttributes.description: This property indicates whether the monitored instance is idle or not

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Guest File System|Guest File System Capacity Property
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Total capacity of guest file system as a property

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Security|Deactivate unauthorized removal, connection of devices (isolation.device.connectable.disable)
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Deactivate unauthorized removal, connection of devices (isolation.device.connectable.disable)

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Storage Policy|Failures to Tolerate
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Number of Host or Disk Failures Storage Object is Able to Tolerate

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Compatibility Mode
resourceTypeAttributes.description: RDM has two compatibility modes: physical and virtual. Virtual mode specifies full virtualization of the mapped device. Physical mode specifies minimal SCSI virtualization of the mapped device.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Virtual Device Node
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Virtual disks SCSI bus location. Virtual disks are enumerated starting with the first controller and moving along the bus.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Security|Deactivate all but VGA mode on virtual machines (svga.vgaOnly)
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Deactivate all but VGA mode on virtual machines (svga.vgaOnly)

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Datastore|Highest Observed Number of Read Requests
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Highest Observed Number of Read Requests

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Is RDM
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Indicates whether the Virtual Disk is an RDM or not

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Creation Date
resourceTypeAttributes.description: VM creation date from vCenter in epoch format

resourceTypeAttributes.name: VCM|Template|Failed Checks
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Number of rule checks that failed

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Guest Operating System|Guest OS IP Address
Virtual Disk|SCSI Controller Type
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Virtual storage controllers connect virtual and physical disks to virtual machine. There are different types of storage controllers available for VMware virtual machines to connect disks and CD/DVD drives.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Disk Space|Snapshot|Age (Days)
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Virtual Machine's topmost snapshot age in days

resourceTypeAttributes.name: SRM Info|Recovery Plans
resourceTypeAttributes.description: List of recovery plans covering the VM

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Guest OS from vCenter
resourceTypeAttributes.description: This is the value provided by vCenter. vCenter set it during VM creation. The value may not match the value inside the Guest

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Security|Deactivate console drag and drop operations (isolation.tools.dnd.disable)
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Deactivate console drag and drop operations (isolation.tools.dnd.disable)

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Guest Operating System|VMware Aria Operations Agent ID
resourceTypeAttributes.description: An ID to identify a VM in Agent Adapter's world

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Guest Operating System|Guest Family
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Guest operating system family, if known

resourceTypeAttributes.name: SRM Info|Protection Group
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Protection group to which the VM belongs

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Network|Port Group
resourceTypeAttributes.description: The network the virtual NIC belongs to. This can be a distributed port group or standard port group.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Storage Policy|Storage Policy in Use
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Storage Policy Associated with the Virtual Disk

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Storage Policy|Stripe Width
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Number of Disk Stripes per Object

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Guest OS Services|Inbound Ports
resourceTypeAttributes.description: List of VM inbound ports, i. e. the ports on which the discovered services are listening

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|UUID
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Instance UUID in vCenter that uniquely identify all virtual machine instances

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Security|Deactivate VIX messages from the VM (isolation.tools.vixMessage.disable)
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Deactivate VIX messages from the VM (isolation.tools.vixMessage.disable)

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Guest Operating System|Tools Version
resourceTypeAttributes.description: VM tools version installed on guest OS

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Is Horizon Managed
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Property indicating whether the object is Horizon Managed.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Security|Enable access to VM console via VNC protocol (RemoteDisplay.vnc.enabled)
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Enable access to VM console via VNC protocol (RemoteDisplay.vnc.enabled)

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Security|Enable 3D features on Server and desktop virtual machines (mks.enable3d)
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Enable 3D features on Server and desktop virtual machines (mks.enable3d)

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Guest File System|Total Capacity Property
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Total capacity of guest file system as a property

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Virtual Disk Sharing
resourceTypeAttributes.description: The sharing option allows VMFS-backed disks to be shared by multiple virtual machines. You can use this option to deactivate the protection for certain cluster-aware applications where the applications ensure that writes originating from two or more different virtual machines does not cause data loss.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Datastore
resourceTypeAttributes.description: This is the name of the datastore where the SCSI Disk resides. In the case of RDMs only the pointer file resides in the datastore

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Guest OS Services|Authentication Method
resourceTypeAttributes.description: VM guest OS authentication method. Guest OS can be authenticated either via common user/password or guest alias

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Changed Block Tracking
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Change Block Tracking, if enabled, track changes on disk sectors. This helps in performing incremental backups on the VM.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Application components running on the Virtual Machine
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Application components running on the Virtual Machine.

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Summary|Guest Operating System|VMware Aria Operations Euc Agent ID
resourceTypeAttributes.description: An ID to identify a VM in Agent Adapter's world

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Virtual Disk|Storage Policy|Site Disaster Tolerance
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Number of Fault Domain Failures Storage Object is Able to Tolerate

resourceTypeAttributes.name: Configuration|Security|Enable send host information to guests (tools.guestlib.enableHostInfo)
resourceTypeAttributes.description: Enable send host information to guests (tools.guestlib.enableHostInfo)
